Role of Academia or Industry in Cultivating the Skill

Academics have provided variuos process and principles which are followed in software quality assurance. By using which we car improve process and product quality and Industries provide medium to apply these knowledge on various projects.


Tools Supporting the Skill

  • Watir
  • Tosca Testsuite
  • TestingWhiz
  • GitHub
  • Jenkins
  • Selenium

Skill Self-Assessment (My Skill Score (1 - 10) and Reasons for Self-Assigned Score

7

Haven't worked on any Software Quality Assurance projects.
